description: Defines the User entity class used for in-memory storage within an authentication backend, representing user information such as ID, provider details, email, name, avatar URL, roles, and timestamps.

classes.name: User
classes.description: A simple User class with properties for user identification, provider info, email, name, avatar URL, roles, and timestamps, with standard getters and setters.

methods.name: User(String id, String provider, String providerUserId, String email, String name, String avatarUrl)
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for creating User with specific details.

methods.name: getRoles
methods.description: Returns the set of roles assigned to the user.

methods.name: setRoles
methods.description: Sets the roles for the user.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Overrides Object.equals to compare Users based on their ID.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Overrides Object.hashCode based on the user ID.
